page.title: 11Employment in Normanby
page.content: In Normanby more than half the population are either involved in full time or part time employment.In the village only one person is not employed who would like to be.15 people travel to work by car,2 by bus, 2 walk,1 by motor cycle,1 cycled and 1 person said he travelled by various kinds of transport.The average daily mileage for travelling to work from Normanby is 10 miles.17 people travel 0-5 miles,12 travel 6-15 miles and just 2 people travel over 15 miles.The reason that some people only travel 0-5 miles is probably because a lot of them might work on the estate.The total population of Normanby is 58 people 3 of whom are retired.
